actionsandpool.action

Class ForseeableAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • actionsandpool.action.Action
      • actionsandpool.action.ForseeableAction

  • public class ForseeableAction
extends Action
    ForseeableAction is an action in which the number of steps is known at the construction.
